content:
";; connect the matrix
(define matrix-module
    (make-circuit (pin row[4] col[5])
    (part )
    ;; col in, row out
    (wire (for*/list ([i (in-range 4)]
                [j (in-range 5)])
               (debug "connecting" i j)
               (*- self.col[j]
                   (list-ref (list-ref matrix i) j)
                   self.row[i])))
    (layout (inset (apply vstack
                      (for/list ([row matrix])
                        (apply hstack row)
                        ))
                    20))))"
